description.subtitle: 1.Platform Overview & Purpose
description.details: Aviio is Adani Airports Holdings Ltd's digital operations platform that connects all airport stakeholders — airlines, ground handlers, security, retail, etc. — on a single system, enabling real-time data sharing, improved collaboration, and smoother airport operations.

description.subtitle: 2. Passenger-Focused Features
description.details: The platform provides passengers with live updates such as security wait times, gate changes, and baggage belt status, aiming to make travel more predictable and seamless.

description.subtitle: 3. Technology & Implementation
description.details: Developed using Flutter, BLoC architecture, and Firebase, Aviio delivers high-performance, scalable features with structured state management, real-time cloud integration, and push notifications to ensure timely updates and smooth operations.

title: Travel Diary – Social Travel Experience Platform

description.subtitle: 1. Platform Purpose & Core Experience
description.details: Travel Diary is a social travel-sharing platform that allows users to document trips, share posts and stories, connect with other travelers, chat in real time, and build a personalized travel community through photos, videos, and meaningful interactions.

description.subtitle: 2. User-Centric Features
description.details: The platform supports posting travel moments with images/videos, following other travelers, viewing time-limited stories, liking/commenting on posts, chatting with followers, managing profiles, and receiving instant notifications for follows, likes, comments, and messages.

description.subtitle: 3. Technology & Implementation
description.details: Built with Flutter for the frontend and Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for the backend, the system integrates Cloudinary for media uploads, Firebase for real-time push notifications, JWT for secure authentication, and a scalable REST API architecture for smooth and responsive performance.

description.subtitle: 1. Project Overview
description.details: A React-based web application that allows users to search and explore food products using the OpenFoodFacts API. It helps users quickly access product details such as ingredients, nutritional values, and categories.

description.subtitle: 2. Key Features
description.details: Product search by name/barcode, category-based filtering, sorting options, detailed product view, and cart/wishlist functionality for saving selected items.

description.subtitle: 3. Technology & Architecture
description.details: Developed using React, Redux for state management, React Router for navigation, and Tailwind CSS for styling. API integration is done via OpenFoodFacts to fetch real-time product information.
